biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Jeremy Glazer (born November 1, 1978) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles in the films Letters From Iwo Jima and Save Me. Glazer has balanced his performances in big-budget blockbusters and independent films with guest appearances on such television shows as Cold Case, Numb3rs, and In Plain Sight.
name: Jeremy Glazer
